DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_LEADS_PORFASE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT B.NOME SUBFASE,COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_SUBFASES B ON A.SUBFASE = B.HANDLE
WHERE A.FASE = 1 AND A.SUBFASE NOT IN (2,31)
GROUP BY B.NOME
UNION
SELECT
 CASE 
 WHEN A.EXACTDESCARTADO ='S' AND C.NOME <> "DESCARTADOS" THEN C.NOME +'- Descartados'
 WHEN A.EXACTDESCARTADO ='S' AND C.NOME = "DESCARTADOS" THEN C.NOME
 WHEN A.EXACTDESCARTADO ='N' THEN C.NOME
 END AS NOME,
 COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_SUBFASES B ON A.SUBFASE = B.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_EXACTFASES C ON A.EXACTFASE = C.HANDLE
GROUP BY C.NOME,A.EXACTDESCARTADO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="SUBFASE" From="A" Path="SUBFASE" /> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
